game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is threatened by a catastrophic event known as "The Great Dissonance." Players take on the role of a "Chronokeeper," tasked with repairing the timestream and preventing the destruction of entire civilizations.
game.beginning: The game begins in the mystical realm of Aethoria, where the player's character is awakened by the enigmatic "Keeper of the Hourglass." With the help of ancient artifacts and mysterious allies, the player must navigate the fragmented timeline to reach the source of the Dissonance.
game.ending: As the player progresses through the game, they will uncover a complex web of time travel, conspiracies, and forgotten lore. Ultimately, the fate of eternity rests in their hands as they face off against the mastermind behind the Great Dissonance: a powerful being known only as "The Time Reaver."
